Sample email
This is a sample email explaining how teachers can register for the product. Copy and paste the below text into an email to teachers.
Note: If usernames and passwords have been created for teachers by administration, you do not need to send the registration code. Instead, send teachers their login information and have them sign into the product.

Register for the product at http://www.kineticmath.com.

To register for A1 MathX Teacher Edition, enter the following code:
ULOTH BEAPA

To register for A2 MathX Teacher Edition, enter the following code:
GSEFG RGDSF
